segments.text: I can see so many potential accidents waiting to happen here.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The most obvious danger is the overflowing sink.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: That puddle is getting wider and deeper with every passing second.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Someone, likely the woman, is going to slip and fall very badly.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Then there's the boy on the stool, reaching for those cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The stool looks incredibly unstable, almost about to give way.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He could easily tumble backward, possibly hitting his head.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's infuriating how oblivious the adult is to these immediate risks.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The thought of broken dishes and injured children is quite distressing.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This kitchen is a ticking time bomb of domestic mishaps.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wish I could reach in and warn them all about the dangers.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: All these potential problems could have been easily avoided.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The lack of awareness from the adult is truly alarming.
segments.speaker: PAR
